mapper.sql: id, name, rate, parent_id, remark, update_time
mapper.update: update t_appraisal_quota set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
